name: overview
hint::English: Data in this section is provided by UNHCR. Do not ask the beneficiary these questions.

name: instructions
english: Please complete this section prior to calling the beneficiary using the information provided by UNHCR.

name: camp_no_camp
english: Is the beneficiary living in-camp or out-of-camp?

name: idp_ref
english: Is the beneficiary an IDP or a refugee?

name: consent
english: Hello, I am working for Impact Initiatives, a humanitarian organization, and we would like to ask the head of your case some questions about cash assistance that you received by ${modality} on behalf of the UNHCR on ${dist_date} in ${dist_location}. The survey usually takes about 30 minutes to complete.  Any information that you provide will be kept strictly confidential. This is voluntary and you can choose not to answer any or all of the questions. If you participate, the information you will provide is essential to evaluate the UNHCR  distribution process. Please be aware, completing this survey is not related to receiving additional assistance from our organization. Do you agree to be interviewed? If you don’t have any questions, may I begin now?

name: phone_number_new
english: Does this  require a different number?

name: new_number
english: Please call this person and continue the interview

name: hhh
english: Are you the head of your case?

name: over_18
english: Is there anyone in the household over the age of 18 I can speak to?

name: time_call
english: When would be more suitable time to call today?

name: screener_1
english: If it is possible to call them the same day, please do so and record the questionnaire under the same form; if you cannot speak with the targeted beneficiary OR a member over the age of 18, kindly abort the questionnaire.

name: remember_date_dist
english: Do you remember receiving cash assistance by ${modality} around ${dist_date} in ${dist_location}?

name: modality_different
english: Through what modality did you receive your assistance?

name: date_different
english: On what date did you receive your assistance?

name: dist_location_different
english: Where did you receive your assistance?

name: ifnot_speak
english: Can I speak with someone who does?

name: remember_date_dist2
english: Do you remember receiving cash assistance by ${modality} around ${dist_date} in ${dist_location}?

name: modality_different2
english: Through what modality did you receive your assistance?

name: date_different2
english: On what date did you receive your assistance?

name: dist_location_different2
english: Where did you receive your assistance?

name: consent_follow_up
english: It is a concern to UNHCR that you didn't receive the assistance you were supposed to receive. Do you mind if we provide your contact details to UNHCR so they can follow up on this issue?

name: phone_number
english: Please enter the beneficiary's phone number from the list

name: screener_2
english: If the participant did NOT receive anything or does NOT remember the distribution and we can't talk to anyone over 18 who does, or if it is impossible to understand them, kindly abort the questionnaire.
relevant: selected(${remember_date_dist}, 'no_remember') and ${age_speaker_2}<18 or selected(${remember_date_dist}, 'received_nothing')  or selected(${ifnot_speak}, 'no') or selected(${remember_date_dist}, 'cant_understand') or selected(${remember_date_dist2}, 'no_remember')  or selected(${remember_date_dist2}, 'cant_understand')

name: governorate
english: In which governorate do you currently live?

name: camp_no_camp1
english: Are you currently living in a camp or out-of-camp?

name: district4
english: In which district do you currently live?

name: camp_name_001
english: In which camp do you currently live?

name: pds_number
english: Do you have a PDS number?

name: ref_number
english: Do you have a UNHCR Registration number?

name: sex_hhh
english: What is the sex of the head of your case?

name: sex_speaker
hint::English: Not necessary to ask if it's obvious from the voice

name: hh_age_groups
english: How many members in each age group are in your household?

name: hh_size_constraint
english: Total household size should be greater than 0.

name: vul_chron_ill
english: Do any members of you case suffer from a chronic illness or medical condition? (diseases that require regular medication ie., diabetes, heart disease)

name: vul_phys_dis
english: Do any members of your case have a permanent disability? (this includes physical, mental, visual, auditory, speech)

name: vul_accomodation_type
english: In what type of accommodation is your household currently living?

name: cash_received
english: Of the assistance we are discussing, how much did you receive, in IQD?

name: aware_winter
english: Are you aware that the cash assistance we are discussing was intended to support your case in preparing for colder winter months?

name: info_sources
english: At the time? did you receive any information about the purpose of the assistance through any of the following?

name: sms_phone
english: SMS or phone call prior to distribution

name: no_information
constraint: not(selected(., "yes") and (selected(${other}, "yes") or selected(${sms_phone}, "yes") or selected(${partner}, "yes") or selected(${flyer}, "yes") or selected(${community_meeting}, "yes") or selected(${camp_management}, "yes") or selected(${unhcr_field_staff}, "yes")))

name: collection_ease
english: How easy did you find it for you to collect your cash assistance?

name: reason_difficult
english: Why did you find it difficult to collect your cash assistance? (select multiple)

name: payment_asked
english: Were you asked to pay someone to receive your assistance?

name: payment_amount
english: How much of your assistance were you asked to pay?

name: payment_asked_yes
english: Could you please tell us more about the circumstances of this issue

name: consent_follow_up1
english: It is a concern to UNHCR that you were asked to pay someone to receive your assistance. Do you mind if we provide your contact details to UNHCR so they can follow up on this issue?

name: phone_number1
english: Please enter the beneficiary's phone number from the list

name: preferred_assistance
english: Would you have prefered in-kind assitance, rather than the cash you received, to support with your winterization needs?

name: complaint
english: Did you want to ask a question or make a complaint about the process or the assistance?

name: complaint_made
english: Were you able to contact someone to ask your question or report a complaint?

name: other_assist
english: We would now like to ask you briefly about any other assistance that you received in the winter months (November to December)

name: kerosene_received
english: Did your case receive kerosene from the government during the winter months (November to December)?

name: kerosene_amount
english: How much kerosene did you receive (in litres)?

name: assistance
english: Did you receive any other forms of assistance during the winter months (November to December)? Not including the assistance we are discussing
constraint_message::English: cannot select ((None)) with any other option

name: assistance_source
english: Who did you receive this assistance from?
constraint_message::English: cannot select ((I don`t know)) with any other option

name: cash_expenditure
english: Now we will go back to discussing the cash assistance for winterization that you received.

name: total_exp
english: In total, how much of the assistance you received did you spend on the following (in IQD):

name: Total_Expenditure
constraint_message::English: Please check with the respondant again about the exact money spent as it cannot be more than the mmoney received.

name: markets_available
english: In the 30 days after receiving assistance, were winterization items such as stoves, heaters, blankets, jackets, shelter maintenance materials, fuel, etc. available in nearby markets?

name: markets_purchase
english: In the 30 days after receiving assistance, did you purchase any winterization items from nearby markets?

name: markets_transport
english: Were the means to transport these items available to you?

name: markets_no_transport
english: What were the reasons why transportation was not available to you?

name: transport_cost
english: How much was the cost of transporting the items that you purchased with your assistance from the market to your shelter (in IQD)?

name: items_unavailable
english: Which winterization items did you need, but were not available to you, in nearby markets in the 30 days after receiving the assistance?
constraint_message::English: cannot select ((all items needed were available)) with any other option

name: needs_before
english: What were your cases main winterization needs in the 30 days prior to receiving the assistance?

name: needs_after
english: What were your cases remaining winterization needs in the 30 days after spending the assistance?

name: assistance_timing
english: Did you feel that the assistance was given to you in time to meet your winter needs?
